If that’s the

case, leave it

to me! I’ll find

those fossils!

Charles, if you’re going to look for fossils, you gotta go the other way!

Wh-Where am I?

Wow,

I’ve come

a long way.

Professor! Professor Sedgwick!

When Darwin returned from the geology field trip to North Wales with Professor Sedgwick, there was an important letter waiting for him that would change his life.

Charles,

this letter is addressed

to you.

Thanks,

sister!

48
